name: Tank Dominance
description:
USE FULL SCREEN TO ENJOY GAME
Tank Dominance is a 3D single-player tank game with intense 5v5 battles. Customize your tank, engage in team-based combat, and dominate the battlefield. Join now and prove your skills now!
Controls:

Navigate Tank: AWSD / Arrow Keys / Left Analog Stick

Control Gun: JL/ IK / Right Analog Stick

Shoot: Space / Left Click  / Triggers

Developer: Daniel Ogunrinde
